summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block "B", Rowe's 1st Addition and Block "D", Rowe's 2nd Addition, between East Denny Way and Loretta Place, from Bellevue Avenue North to Olive Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Petition No. 112354 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
